Rules.InvariantScript:
Switch(
    Orderby,
        "title",
            If(OrderTitle,
                Sort(Parent.BoardData,BOARD_TITLE),
                Sort(Parent.BoardData,BOARD_TITLE,SortOrder.Descending)),
        "date",
            If(OrderDate,
                Sort(Parent.BoardData,REGI_DATE,SortOrder.Descending),
                Sort(Parent.BoardData,REGI_DATE)),
        "name",
            If(OrderName,
                Sort(Parent.BoardData,REGI_ID),
                Sort(Parent.BoardData,REGI_ID,SortOrder.Descending)),
    Sort(Parent.BoardData,REGI_DATE,SortOrder.Descending))
